basics.name: Saurabh Dutta
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary:
Hey! I'm Saurabh, a full-stack developer, who strives to develop efficient backend solutions and design beautiful & user-friendly user interfaces. This is my home on the web where I post my thoughts and showcase my work and a bit about myself.
I'm an avid podcast listener and a horror movie buff. In my free time, I also do like to do some competitive programming.
I try my hands on a lot of things but I consider myself best at Java & Javascript. For the backend, I mostly use Express framework or Spring framework with git as the version control system. For the frontend, I work best with Angular, also learning React now. For the Database, I like Mongo and PostgreSQL.

location.address: MIG B/124 Ganpati Enclave, Kolar Road

highlights: Working with InvestCloud A-Tier team to manage their core application server layer used by many clients around the world for ther investment trading platform
Worked to develop the system for Capital One, to avoid being blacklisted by Spamhaus, with analyzing email bounce events.
Involved in development & maintenance of the systems for credit card limit increase opt-ins and card account preferences.
Built a cross-platform mobile App with Ionic for a POC project which tags customers bank transactions.
Got hands-on experience on various technologies credits to extensive Instructor-led training program of Infogain.
Responsible for maintenance of NCR's monitoring product called VISION, which monitors administer ATMs.
Learned about Software Development Life Cycle.
Written Java based XML Marshaller for MT 101 SWIFT message payment request.

awards.title: Digirupt 3rd Runner Up

awards.summary: Awarded as Best Consultant/Technical Expert for contribution to Capital One client.

projects.name: Ambuhelp
projects.description: AmbuHelp is an attempt to create an emergency alert solution which enables user to get the nearest available ambulance and medical center, and allowing us to notify his/her emergency contacts on a single tap. Won 4th Prize for this hackathon project hosted by Wipro.

projects.name: HYDRAE – Digital Messaging System
projects.description: Contributed to development of HYDRAE Digital Messaging System for Capital One, which enables them to  avoid Spamhouse trap based on feedback from email vendors like Sparkpost, Salesforce, etc. and create a  hygienic database system for email endpoints.  Worked on AWS lambda functions for providing file/event- based integration and triggers to the HYDRAE system.

projects.name: Gitbot
projects.description: Gitbot, is a slack bot to give basic information about the selected repository in your slack channel, help you fetching your repository code and most importantly commits to your repository with uploaded code in your channel.

projects.name: Jainam
projects.description: Jainam is a effort in hope to create a digital platform that serves the entire Jain community and makes knowledge sharing an accessible process. I've helped the team to build their REST API backed system, along with monitoring dashboard and housekeeping lambda functions.

projects.name: Aquasense
projects.description: Aquasense is working towards the way to revolutionize how water resources systems work in the world. I've contributed towards the development of dashboard and API system for their IoT devices, along with gitlab-runner based CI/CD pipeline.

projects.name: Train Status: Alexa Skill
projects.description: Alexa skill to get live status of their train by giving railway number as input. Uses AWS lambda function to  invoke action and give an appropriate response.  This BOT is powered By Railway API (https://railwayapi.com/).
